articles.title: Taiwan February exports seen rising for 20th straight month - Reuters
articles.description: Taiwan's exports likely rose for the 20th straight month in February but at a slower pace, a Reuters poll showed, boosted by sustained demand for chips and hi-tech gadgets despite a week-long Lunar New Year holiday.
